title: Automatic welding machines for Cuplock Standard
description:
Automated high-speed machines that weld 3 cups simultaneously with uniform results to build top-quality, load-bearing Cuplock Standards/Verticals.

Key Features

  • High Rate of Accuracy
  • Consistent Output
  • High Output Speed
  • Adjustable Angles

title: Automatic welding machines for Cuplock Ledger
description:
Durable, high-efficiency machine capable of simultaneously welding ledger blades to both ends of a scaffolding pipe. Ideal for mass production of scaffolding ledgers.

Key Features

  • High Accuracy
  • Consistent Bead Welding
  • Fast Production Output
  • Adjustable Jigs

title: Automatic welding machines for Jacks
description:
Precision-guided automated welding system built for producing high-quality base jacks and U-jacks at scale.

Key Features

  • Accurate Thread & Plate Welding
  • Uniform Output
  • High Productivity
  • Heavy-Duty Construction

title: Automatic welding machines for Prop Inner
description:
Auto-welding machines designed for the inner tubes of adjustable props with consistent welding of nuts and accessories.

Key Features

  • High Accuracy
  • Uniform Welding
  • Increased Production Efficiency
  • Adjustable Holding Fixtures

title: Automatic welding machines for Prop Outer
description:
Automated welding setups for outer tubes of adjustable props, supporting high-volume production environments.

Key Features

  • Consistent Weld Output
  • Accurate Placement of Collars & Accessories
  • High Output Speed
  • Durable and Rugged Machine Build

title: Shot Blasting
description:
Essential process for cleaning and preparing metal surfaces before painting or galvanizing.

Advantages

  • Superior Surface Finish
  • Rust & Scale Removal
  • Paint/Coating Adhesion Improvement
  • Increased Lifespan of Scaffolding Components

title: Multi Spindle Drilling
description:
High-productivity drilling solution ideal for components requiring multiple precise drill points.

Applications & Benefits

  • Accurate Hole Positioning
  • High-Speed Simultaneous Drilling
  • Perfect for Scaffolding Components
  • Boosts Production Efficiency

title: Tread Rolling
description:
Used for producing threaded sections for jacks, props, or other structural components.

Benefits

  • Stronger Threads vs Cut Threads
  • Uniform Rolling
  • High Output Rate
  • Durable and Precise Machinery

title: Hydraulic Power Press (H, C Type)
description:
Heavy-duty hydraulic presses used for punching, bending, and forming scaffolding parts.

Key Features

  • High Force Capacity
  • Accurate Operation
  • Suitable for Multiple Scaffolding Components
  • Long-Lasting Industrial Build

title: Dip Painting Conveyor
description:
Continuous painting system ideal for mass-production finishing of scaffolding products.

Advantages

  • Uniform Dip Coating
  • Fast Workflow
  • Reduced Manual Labor
  • Improved Corrosion Protection
